cosmere-level-wizard.Title: Level Up Wizard
cosmere-level-wizard.AttributePointsDescription: You gain {points} attribute point(s) to distribute among your attributes.
cosmere-level-wizard.AttributeSecondaryDescription: Increasing your {attr} changes the following values:

AttributeSecondaryDetails.LiftingCapacityIncrease: Base lifting capacity increases from {old} to {new}
AttributeSecondaryDetails.CarryingCapacityIncrease: Base carrying capacity increases from {old} to {new}
AttributeSecondaryDetails.UnarmedDmgIncrease: Base unarmed damage increases from {old} to {new}

cosmere-level-wizard.HealthIncludeStrength: You gain {health} health plus your Strength attribute.
cosmere-level-wizard.SkillRanksDescription: You gain {ranks} skill rank(s) to distribute. Maximum rank per skill at this level: {max}.
cosmere-level-wizard.TalentsDescription: You gain {count} talent(s) at this level.
cosmere-level-wizard.AncestryBonusTalentsDescription: You gain {count} ancestry bonus talent(s) at this level.
cosmere-level-wizard.TalentsNote: Talents must be selected separately from the character sheet after leveling up.
cosmere-level-wizard.ChoiceDescription: You may choose to gain either {count} skill rank(s) or {count} talent(s).
